channel.title: RebirthRS | 614 PK Server | Full integrated | Amazing combat
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2mg9sv8.png[/img]
Hey, I have decided to Re-release Legacy614, Re written from the ground!
[B][color=#2E64FE]Forums:[/COLOR][/B] [url=http://www.rebirthrs.com/index.php]http://www.rebirthrs.com/index.php[/url] [B][COLOR=#2E64FE]Download:[/COLOR][/B] [url=http://www.rebirthrs.com/play/Rebirth614.jar]http://www.rebirthrs.com/play/Rebirth614.jar[/url] [B][COLOR=#2E64FE]Vote:[/COLOR][/B] [url=http://rspsvote.com/widget/index.php?server=HrMNi]http://rspsvote.com/widget/index.php?server=HrMNi[/url]
[COLOR=#2E64FE][U]RebirthRS[/U][/COLOR] Spawn, PvP System, Friendly Staff
[COLOR=#2E64FE][U]About RebirthRS[/U][/COLOR] - Networking was entirely redone - Cache system entirely redone - Packets entirely redone from the ground up (walking, clicking, talking, etc) - Combat was removed completely and redone from the ground up to remove all of the glitches - Pathfinding/clipping was redone so you can no longer glitch people into the wildy - Commands were redone (just necessary ones) - New quest interface and item spawning system - New MySQL integration. I will explain this more later in the post - Username changing system (perk for donators) - Entire shop system - Token system/point system redone and reimagined - A new task system; server does not lag and is concurrent with its tasks (perfect switches, minimal lag) - Server currently uses 40mb of ram - New clan chat system - New forum registration system - The new highscores which take into account your kills/deaths of each type (safe/dangerous) and give you a score and you are ranked by it - Pvp/Spawn Based - Re written Trade handlers - Re written combat - Global objects & Npchandling & Spawning - New exp rates - 400+ players registered - Friendly Staff - Dedicated Server - News - Server Messages
[U][COLOR=#2E64FE]PvP/Pking[/COLOR][/U] - Mage system redone - Prayer system redone - All Weapon Special Attacks - We have a perfected Pvp system. - We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking. - Switching is near perfect (99% Old RS Speeds) - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Curses Prayers)
[U][COLOR=#2E64FE]Other[/COLOR][/U] - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Flawless Music & Sound system - Perfect XP counter - Perfect Equipment Stats - Item On Item - Configurations - Dicing - Flower Game
[U][COLOR=#2E64FE]Media[/COLOR][/U]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2n8voee.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/27y9w84.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/29wwx6v.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/6xu5j4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/igvv34.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/ejwwi0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/rtpceu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/11w3c6o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2dvkao8.png[/img]
[COLOR=#FFFFFF]Thanks for reading![/COLOR][/CENTER]

item.title: RebirthRS | 614 PK Server | Full integrated | Amazing combat
item.dc:creator: @rebirthrs rebirthrs
item.description:
@rebirthrs wrote:

[CENTER]

Hey, I have decided to Re-release Legacy614, Re written from the ground!

[B][color=#2E64FE]Forums:[/COLOR][/B] http://www.rebirthrs.com/index.php
[B][COLOR=#2E64FE]Download:[/COLOR][/B] http://www.rebirthrs.com/play/Rebirth614.jar
[B][COLOR=#2E64FE]Vote:[/COLOR][/B] http://rspsvote.com/widget/index.php?server=HrMNi

[COLOR=#2E64FE][U]RebirthRS[/U][/COLOR]
Spawn, PvP System, Friendly Staff

[COLOR=#2E64FE][U]About RebirthRS[/U][/COLOR]

  • Networking was entirely redone
  • Cache system entirely redone
  • Packets entirely redone from the ground up (walking, clicking, talking, etc)
  • Combat was removed completely and redone from the ground up to remove all of the glitches
  • Pathfinding/clipping was redone so you can no longer glitch people into the wildy
  • Commands were redone (just necessary ones)
  • New quest interface and item spawning system
  • New MySQL integration. I will explain this more later in the post
  • Username changing system (perk for donators)
  • Entire shop system
  • Token system/point system redone and reimagined
  • A new task system; server does not lag and is concurrent with its tasks (perfect switches, minimal lag)
  • Server currently uses 40mb of ram
  • New clan chat system
  • New forum registration system
  • The new highscores which take into account your kills/deaths of each type (safe/dangerous) and give you a score and you are ranked by it
  • Pvp/Spawn Based
  • Re written Trade handlers
  • Re written combat
  • Global objects & Npchandling & Spawning
  • New exp rates
  • 400+ players registered
  • Friendly Staff
  • Dedicated Server
  • News
  • Server Messages

[U][COLOR=#2E64FE]PvP/Pking[/COLOR][/U]

  • Mage system redone
  • Prayer system redone
  • All Weapon Special Attacks
  • We have a perfected Pvp system.
  • We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking.
  • Switching is near perfect (99% Old RS Speeds)
  • Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless
  • Armour set effects all added!
  • Degrading Pvp Armours
  • Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Curses Prayers)

[U][COLOR=#2E64FE]Other[/COLOR][/U]

  • All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons!
  • Flawless Music & Sound system
  • Perfect XP counter
  • Perfect Equipment Stats
  • Item On Item
  • Configurations
  • Dicing
  • Flower Game

[U][COLOR=#2E64FE]Media[/COLOR][/U]








[COLOR=#FFFFFF]Thanks for reading![/COLOR][/CENTER]

Read full topic
